tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_indicator_logframe_category AS SELECT v.amp_activity_id, acv.category_value::text logframe_category, v.indicator_connection_id, v.acv_id id, v.indicator_id FROM ( SELECT con.activity_id amp_activity_id, con.id indicator_connection_id, max(val.ind_val_category) acv_id, con.indicator_id FROM amp_indicator_connection con, amp_indicator_values val WHERE val.ind_connect_id = con.id AND con.sub_clazz::text = 'a'::text GROUP BY con.activity_id, con.id ) v LEFT JOIN amp_category_value acv ON v.acv_id=acv.id;
